verses.verse: וַיַּרְאֵ֗נִי <S%H7200><s%> vai-yar-'E-ni, And he shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' me Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the high עֹמֵ֕ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med standing לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach the angel יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְהַשָּׂטָ֛ן <S%H7854><s%> ve-has-sa-Tan and Satan עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med standing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at יְמִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No at his right hand לְשִׂטְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7853><s%> le-sit-No. to resist

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan, unto Satan יִגְעַ֨ר <S%H1605><s%> yig-'Ar rebuke יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בְּךָ֙ be-Cha הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> has-sa-Tan, thee O Satan וְיִגְעַ֤ר <S%H1605><s%> ve-yig-'Ar rebuke יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh even the LORD בְּךָ֔ <S%H99999><s%> be-Cha, הַבֹּחֵ֖ר <S%H977><s%> hab-bo-Cher that hath chosen בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; Jerusalem הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not זֶ֦ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh is this א֖וּד <S%H181><s%> 'ud thee [is] not this a brand מֻצָּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> mutz-Tzal plucked מֵאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> me-'Esh. burning

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֕עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' Now Joshua הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become לָבֻ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> la-Vush was clothed בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim garments צוֹאִ֑ים <S%H6674><s%> tzo-'Im; with filthy וְעֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> ve-'o-Med and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַמַּלְאָֽךְ׃ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach. the angel

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an And he answered וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעֹמְדִ֤ים <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-me-Dim unto those that stood לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, him saying הָסִ֛ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> ha-Si-ru Take away הַבְּגָדִ֥ים <S%H899><s%> hab-be-ga-Dim garments הַצֹּאִ֖ים <S%H6674><s%> hatz-tzo-'Im the filthy מֵעָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lav; and וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer from him And unto him he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him רְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh Behold הֶעֱבַ֤רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> he-'e-Var-ti to pass מֵעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-cha and עֲוֹנֶ֔ךָ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Ne-cha, I have caused thine iniquity וְהַלְבֵּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> ve-hal-Besh from thee and I will clothe אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha מַחֲלָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H4254><s%> ma-cha-la-Tzot. thee with change of raiment

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar And I said יָשִׂ֛ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ya-Si-mu Let them set צָנִ֥יף <S%H6797><s%> tza-Nif mitre טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor a fair עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho; upon his head וַיָּשִׂימוּ֩ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-si-Mu So they set הַצָּנִ֨יף <S%H6797><s%> hatz-tza-Nif mitre הַטָּה֜וֹר <S%H2889><s%> hat-ta-Hor a fair עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho, upon his head וַיַּלְבִּשֻׁ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> vai-yal-bi-Shu-hu and clothed בְּגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim, him with garments וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> u-mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עֹמֵֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med. stood by

וַיָּ֙עַד֙ <S%H5749><s%> vai-Ya-'ad protested מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God בִּיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> bi-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If בִּדְרָכַ֤י <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chai in my ways תֵּלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> te-leCh will walk וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im and if אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-Ti my charge תִשְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor, and if thou wilt keep וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- will also אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you תָּדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> ta-Din then thou shalt also judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti, my house וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor and shalt also keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲצֵרָ֑י <S%H2691><s%> cha-tze-Rai; my courts וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will give לְךָ֙ <S%H99999><s%> le-Cha מַהְלְכִ֔ים <S%H4108><s%> mah-le-Chim, thee places to walk בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-me-Dim among these that stand by הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. these

שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'- Hear נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> na Now יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ׀ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' now O Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the high אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְרֵעֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7453><s%> ve-re-'Ei-cha thou and thy fellows הַיֹּשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim that sit לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, before כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- indeed אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei are men מוֹפֵ֖ת <S%H4159><s%> mo-Fet wondered at הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah; like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- indeed הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni I am going מֵבִ֛יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi for behold I will bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di my servant צֶֽמַח׃ <S%H6780><s%> Tze-mach. the BRANCH

כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold הָאֶ֗בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven, For behold the stone אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti that I have laid לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', Joshua עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stone אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat upon one שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah [shall be] seven עֵינָ֑יִם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim; eyes הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מְפַתֵּ֣חַ <S%H6605><s%> me-fat-Te-ach behold I will engrave פִּתֻּחָ֗הּ <S%H6603><s%> pit-tu-Chah, the graving נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um thereof saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts וּמַשְׁתִּ֛י <S%H4185><s%> u-mash-Ti and I will remove אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity הָאָֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-retz- of that land הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. in one

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts תִּקְרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> tik-re-'U shall ye call אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu; his neighbour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under גֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> Ge-fen under the vine וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under תְּאֵנָֽה׃ <S%H8384><s%> te-'e-Nah. and under the fig tree
